title: Can Kindred die?
body: If so, what ramifications would this have for Runeterra?

replies.body: the really question is can {{champion:202}}  count to five

Kindred are just the way the population of Runeterra looks at death. They are the same as our Grim Reaper.

No, Kindred can't die. Not until every living thing is dead that is, because death is only defined by life.

it's a lamb eat lamb world

I'd say yes, in the sense that she can probably be erased from existence. I know a few champions who wouldn't mind helping us to find out either.
And what of Wolf, the other half of Kindred?(they are two distinct "people" after all)
I'd imagine they can't exist without each other since they kind of represent the duality of death. Poof one the other goes with. Since the one you control is lamb I just call them she.
Take a look at post 6.13 kindred

Until Riot actually comes with an answer, it entirely depends on how you interpret them.  There have been several fictional universes where the personification of death is killed.  What happens after is up to the writers.
